description:
Fool, the mysterious spirit of the theater, narrates this stirring recap of Sora’s initiation into the high-flying world of Kaleido Stage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El Fantástico Prólogo del Estrellato (Primera parte)
The Amazing Prologue to Stardom, Part 1
スターへの すごい プロローグ (前編)
